name: Cartastrophe
description:
Your car is completely Out of Control! Thankfully 911 Dispatch is on your side and can activate certain city services at your request.

Survive as long as you can in this endless runner where you control everything except for the car itself.

Created (solo) by Kilan Sky Larsen in 48 hours for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam!

Credit for all background music goes to Eric Matayas: https://soundimage.org/ 
Main Menu: Techno-Gameplay-Looping
Game Level: Frantic-Gameplay
